oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Centennial celebrations; Exhibition buildings; Exhibitions; Events; Fairs; Anniversaries; Commemorations; Libraries; Sculpture; Bas-reliefs; Chandeliers; Armor
Tennessee Centennial and International Exposition (1897 : Nashville, Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Interior view of the library in the Woman's Building of the Tennessee Centennial Exposition. In addition to several volumes of books, the room is adorned with furniture, sculpture and an elaborate bas-relief mantel. An electric chandelier hangs from the ceiling.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Calvert Bros. & Taylor
